result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Myron Wendell Crone Sr.

records.addlTxt:
9:47 AM Defendant Myron Wendell Crone Sr. in court.  Attorney Daniel James Chapman in court for Myron Wendell Crone Sr.  Attorney Bruce Robert Poquette in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances.  Attny Chapman requests to proceed with preliminary hearing.  State indicates no officer present, and no officer on zoom.  Attny Chapman makes statement.   State apologizes and requests reset.   DEF needs to sign bond.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Preliminary hearing on November 29, 2022 at 09:45 am.
SECOND NOTICE - mailed requesting signature on bond.
Bond mailed to DEF for signature
Preliminary hearing on September 20, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Cancelled per phone call to:  Cory, SWSO Dispatch, 5/24/22 at 1:18PM

11:42 AM Defendant Myron Wendell Crone Sr. in court.  Attorney Kenneth Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Daniel James Chapman in court for Myron Wendell Crone Sr. Court calls case (22CF102, 21CF313, 21CF105, and 21CF45) and recites appearances. 

22CM102 - Court reviews case.  Court quashes warrant.  Atty Chapman indicates DEF must contact PD's office.  Atty Chapman agrees to proceed with INIT.  DEF received copy of criminal complaint in court on this date.  DEF verifies DOB and address. Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  State requests SIBS $2500.  Atty Chapman no objection.  Court sets bond.  [COURT:  SIBS $2500 ]

21CF313 -Atty Chapman acknowledges information, waives reading, enters NG plea on behalf of DEF.  DEF agrees.  Court enters NG Plea, finds probable cause and binds DEF over for trial. 

22CF102 - Atty Chapman requests scheduling a preliminary hearing, waiving time limits.  DEF agrees.  Court sets prelim for 9/20/22 at 9:30AM.  

Court sets STC for 9/20/22 in 9:30AM for 21CF313, 21CF105, and 21CF45 
 
Next Court Appearance Card completed by Court Officer and given to DEF.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Voluntary appearance/Initial appearance on May 24, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Uploaded and processed document to Sharefile, sent paper copy to dispatch, printed warrant card.

09:18 AM Defendant Myron Wendell Crone not in court.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Court calls case and recites appearances.  State requests warrant.   Court grants request.  Warrant authorized (Statewide) as requested.
